"Virtual Reality: A Journey Through the World" - A film festival featuring only virtual reality films, (outer space) and (underwater) themes.
"The Chronicles" - A film festival showcasing the (outer space) and (underwater) genres, (outer space) and (underwater)-themed (outer space) and sono (inner space) films.
"The Canon Chronicles" - A film festival featuring the top 100 best films of all time, organized by genre (canon) and by year of release.
"The Inner Space Chronicles" - A film festival showcasing the inner space and inner space-themed films, organized by genre (inner space) and by year of release.
"The Outer Space Chronicles" - A film festival featuring the outer space and outer space-themed films, organized by genre (outer space) and by year of release.
